platform.core.profile.category.notifications=Notificacions notifications.filters.cancel=Cancel·lar notifications.filters.submit=Desa notifications.filters.type.label=Tipus de filtre: ### Missing: notifications.filters.type.hint=How the filter should act towards an event in the given location notifications.filters.location.label=Àmbit de filtre: ### Missing: notifications.filters.location.hint=What part of the wiki should be concerned by the filter?
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=Opcions avançades de filtratge ### Missing: notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=These filters are activated by default, you can disable them by using the button next to each filter. notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=Nom del filtre notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=Descripció notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=Commuta notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=Tanca
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=Filtre de cerca notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=Amaga les notificacions de l'usuari de sistema notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Filtre d'esdeveniments propis ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Hide notifications about your own activity ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=Read Event Filter (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=Read Event Filter (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages

## Notifications toggles ### Missing: notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=You need to enable notifications in your settings if you wish to watch these locations
## Notifications formats ### Missing: notifications.format.alert=Alert ### Missing: notifications.format.email=Email ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=Deleting... ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done=Filter preference deleted! ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=Failed to delete the filter preference ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=Saving... ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=Filter preference saved! ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=Failed to save the filter preference ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=-
## System Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=Filtres del sistema ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=System filters that you can switches to have a more fine-grained control of the notifications you want to receive. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=Nom notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterDescription=Descripció notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=Descripció notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=Formats notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=Està activat?
## Custom Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=Filtres personalitzats notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=Crea filtres per controlar les notificacions que vols rebre. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterPreferenceId=Identificador notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.scope=Àmbit notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.location=Localització notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=Acció del filtre notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=Esdeveniments notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=Formats notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=Està activat? notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=Accions notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=Notifica l'esdeveniment notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=Ignora l'esdeveniment ### Missing: notifications.settings.addFilter=Add filter notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=Crea un filtre per als esdeveniments que succeeixen en ubicacions específiques. El filtre pot activar l'enviament d'una notificació o evitar que se n'enviï una, depenent de l'esdeveniment i del canal de notificació. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=Ubicació notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=Aquest filtre s'aplica als esdeveniments que succeeixen a les ubicacions seleccionades aquí. Seleccioneu una o més ubicacions. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=Acció notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=Aquest filtre pot notificar o ignorar els esdeveniments que succeeixen a les ubicacions seleccionades. Trieu l'acció que voleu fer per als esdeveniments. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=Notifica l'esdeveniment notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=Ignora l'esdeveniment notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=Canal notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=Aquest filtre només s'aplica a les notificacions enviades als canals de comunicació seleccionats a continuació. Escull un o més canals de comunicació. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=Esdeveniments notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=Aquest filtre s'aplica als esdeveniments seleccionats aquí, a les ubicacions seleccionades anteriorment. Tria un o més esdeveniments. notifications.menu.header=Notificacions notifications.menu.header.settings=Preferències ### Missing: notifications.menu.clear=Clear All ### Missing: notifications.menu.clearing=Clearing the notifications ### Missing: notifications.menu.cleared=Notifications have been cleared ### Missing: notifications.settings.title=Notifications Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=You need to be administrator to see this. ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu=Notification menu ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu.hint=The notification menu is located on the top right of the page, and you can see it by clicking on the bell ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.email=Email ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.disabled=The notifications emails are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.hint=An email is sent to you regularly with a summary of what happened on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.saving=Your settings are being saved... ### Missing: notifications.settings.saved=Saved! ### Missing: notifications.settings.savingfailed=Failed to save your settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters=Filters ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Error: you must select a wiki, not a page ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.appName=Name notifications.settings.applications.table.dropdown.toggle.label=Alterna els detalls de les notificacions de l''aplicació {0}. ### Missing: notifications.settings.events=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.events.by=edited by {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastChange=Last change: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastComment=Last ## Common notification settings errors notifications.settings.error.userReferenceNotSupported=La referència d'usuari indicada no està suportada, només DocumentUserReference està suportada de moment. notifications.settings.error.userReferenceAdminForbidden=No teniu dret d''administració per a l''usuari donat: {0}. notifications.settings.error.badCSRF=Token CSRF incorrecte. notifications.settings.badParameters=Paràmetres de petició incorrectes.

## Watch button and modal
notifications.watch.button.title=Paràmetre de notificació actual per a aquesta pàgina: {0} - Feu clic per canviar-la notifications.watch.button.status.notset=No establert notifications.watch.button.status.followed=Seguit notifications.watch.button.status.blocked=Bloquejat notifications.watch.button.status.custom=A mida notifications.watch.modal.title=Paràmetres de notificació per a aquesta pàgina notifications.watch.modal.description.options=Podeu canviar la configuració actual de les notificacions amb les opcions següents: notifications.watch.modal.description.ancestoroption=Podeu anar a {0} i modificar-hi la configuració de les notificacions o aplicar-la directament a la pàgina actual amb les opcions següents: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Configuració de seguiment de la pàgina notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Esteu seguint aquesta pàgina: rebreu notificacions per a això. notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Configuració de seguiment de la pàgina pare notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Esteu seguint aquesta pàgina a través d'un pare de la jerarquia: rebreu notificacions per a això. notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Configuració de la pàgina i els fills notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Estàs seguint aquesta pàgina i els seus fills: rebràs notificacions per a això. notifications.watch.modal.title.NOT_SET=No establerta la configuració de seguiment notifications.watch.modal.description.NOT_SET=Encara no heu configurat cap configuració per a veure aquesta pàgina i, per tant, no esteu seguint aquesta pàgina: no rebreu notificacions per a ella. notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Configuració de seguiment de pàgina bloquejada notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Estàs ignorant aquesta pàgina: no rebràs cap notificació. notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Pàgina bloquejada per configuració de seguiment de la pàgina pare notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Estàs ignorant aquesta pàgina a través d'un pare de la jerarquia: no rebràs cap notificació per a això. notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Configuració de seguiment bloquejada per la pàgina i els seus fills notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Estàs ignorant aquesta pàgina i els seus fills: no rebràs cap notificació per ella. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.CUSTOM=Custom watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.CUSTOM=You are using custom notification settings for this page: you might be following or blocking specific events for the page or you might target only specific channels for the notifications. We invite you to review your notification settings from your profile. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.title=Follow current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.hint=You will receive notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.title=Follow current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.hint=You will receive notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.title=Follow entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will receive notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.title=Block current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.hint=You will block any notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.title=Block current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.hint=You will block any notifications for that page and all of its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.title=Unfollow current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.hint=You will stop receiving notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.title=Unfollow current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.hint=You will stop receiving notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.title=Unfollow entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will stop receiving notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.title=Unblock current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.hint=You will receive notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.title=Unblock current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.hint=You will receive notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.title=Unblock entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will stop ignoring notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.close=Close without saving ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.savechanges=Save changes ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.gotosettings=Manage all notifications settings
